guest

Class GuestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • guest.GuestController

  • public class GuestController
extends java.lang.Object
    Guest Controller Basically make use of the Guest entity class and manipulate the data Hence, it role is to include of logics that involves the Guest entity class
    Since:
    13/4/2017
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Low Shu En

    • Method Detail

      • getGuestByPassport

        public static Guest getGuestByPassport(java.lang.String passport)
        Search by passport only returns one Guest object as passport is a primary key
        Parameters:
        passport - Passport of Guest object
        Returns:
        the guest object that contains the passport that is being passed in else @return null if no such passport exist

      • removeGuest

        public static boolean removeGuest(Guest guest)
        This method basically remove that particular guest that is being passed into the parameter from the guest list and data file
        Parameters:
        guest - Guest object to be removed
        Returns:
        true if guest is removed successfully else @return false if the removal is unsuccessful

      • retrieveGuestList

        public static java.util.List<Guest> retrieveGuestList()
        Returns:
        the list containing all guest objects

      • searchByKeyword

        public static java.util.List<Guest> searchByKeyword(java.lang.String keyword)
        Search by entering keyword of name
        Parameters:
        keyword - Keyword for search
        Returns:
        the list of guest objects with names containing that keyword else @return if no such name with keyword exist

      • updateGuestList

        public static boolean updateGuestList(Guest guest)
        This method basically create or update the particular Guest object that is being passed into the parameter It checks if the guest object exist or not, if exists, it is being override (updated) else it creates the guest into the data file guest list is being updated accordingly
        Parameters:
        guest - Guest object to be created or updated
        Returns:
        true if guest is updated / created successfully else @return false if updating or creating of guest is unsuccessful
